attributes.title: How To Abandon Your Kid - #159
attributes.caption: So this is family-friendly? Pretty sure Mr. Rogers and Captain Kangaroo didn’t have this in mind.
attributes.description: So this is family-friendly? Pretty sure Mr. Rogers and Captain Kangaroo didn’t have this in mind. Featuring Jon Risinger, Burnie Burns, Chris Demarais, Chad James and Jessica Vassami. Sponsored by Hims (http://bit.ly/2O1aQEr) Robinhood (http://bit.ly/2O0QFqq) and Upstart (http://bit.ly/2O443tJ).

attributes.title: This Teacher Twerks - #160
attributes.caption: Our odd new game Do It On The Floor proves “You can’t lie in the Happy Room but you can lie down."
attributes.description: Our odd new game Do It On The Floor proves “You can’t lie in the Happy Room but you can lie down.” Featuring Jon Risinger, Barbara Dunkelman, Trevor Collins, Mariel Salcedo, and Cole Gallian. Sponsored by Candid Co (http://bit.ly/2Dk97qG), Mint Mobile (http://bit.ly/2OihkiG), and MVMT Watches (http://bit.ly/2zPGRIp)

attributes.title: I'm Playing Apex Legends, Mom! - #161
attributes.caption: America's favorite manchild Max will stop at nothing to play Apex Legends at all times, while Andrew must dodge racist lasers!
attributes.description: America's favorite manchild Max will stop at nothing to play Apex Legends at all times, while Andrew must dodge racist lasers! Featuring Jon Risinger, Ellie Main, Max Kruemcke, Christina Parrish and Andrew Rosas. Sponsored by Credit Karma TAX (http://bit.ly/2OhfNJB) and RTX Austin 2019 (http://bit.ly/2CfoyRe)

attributes.title: King Joel & Doomsday Dog - #162
attributes.caption: Joel doesn’t know how to share and Max the dog boy barks up a really weird tree for this episode of On The Spot. Hosted by Jon Risinger. Featuring Joel Heyman, Ellie Main, Max Kruemcke and Todd Womack.
attributes.description: Joel doesn’t know how to share and Max the dog boy barks up a really weird tree for this episode of On The Spot. Hosted by Jon Risinger. Featuring Joel Heyman, Ellie Main, Max Kruemcke and Todd Womack. Sponsored by Burrow (http://bit.ly/2HVhoV1) Credit Karma Tax (http://bit.ly/2OhfNJB) and the Postmates app for iOS and Android.

attributes.title: Space Wizard Happy Ending - #163
attributes.caption: The origin of the Italian Ninja Turtle Men is revealed, and find out the truth behind the sloppy space wizard and the safest banana of all time!
attributes.description: The origin of the Italian Ninja Turtle Men is revealed, and find out the truth behind the sloppy space wizard and the safest banana of all time! Featuring Adam Kovic, Matt Bragg, Barbara Dunkelman, and Chad James. Hosted by Jon Risinger Sponsored by Robinhood (http://bit.ly/2O0QFqq), Mint Mobile (http://bit.ly/2OihkiG), and Candid Co. (http://bit.ly/2Dk97qG).

attributes.title: Russian Space Madness! - #164
attributes.caption: Jeremy shows Gus how to pee in outer space, then eats an orange with the peel, and calls out the "Alluminiti" for being so flat Earthy.
attributes.description: Jeremy shows Gus how to pee in outer space. Hosted by Jon Risinger. Featuring Gus Sorola, Jeremy Dooley, Mariel Salcedo and Andrew Rosas. Sponsored by Upstart (http://bit.ly/2O443tJ), HelloFresh (http://bit.ly/2XdOLWG) and RTX Austin (http://bit.ly/2CfoyRe).

attributes.title: Stop Licking the Carpet - #165
attributes.caption: Michael gets intimate with the carpet, Miles celebrates his birthday like a maniac, and Chad is still learning the rules of the show he's on every other week.
attributes.description: Michael gets intimate with the carpet, Miles celebrates his birthday like a maniac, and Chad is still learning the rules of the show he's on every other week. Hosted by Jon Risinger. Episode #165 featuring Miles Luna, Michael Jones, Ellie Main, and Chad James. Sponsored by HIMS (http://bit.ly/2O1aQEr), MVMT (http://bit.ly/2zPGRIp) and Burrow (http://bit.ly/2HVhoV1).

attributes.title: Death of a Puppet - #166
attributes.caption: The strangest vaudeville act of all time drops by the show and Jess finds out what it's like to go clubbing with Barbara.
attributes.description: The strangest vaudeville act of all time drops by the show and Jess finds out what it's like to go clubbing with Barbara. Hosted by Jon Risinger. Episode #166 featuring Barbara Dunkelman, Blaine Gibson, Chris Demarais, and Jessica Vasami. Sponsored by Candid Co. (http://bit.ly/2Dk97qG), Upstart (http://bit.ly/2O443tJ), and RTX (https://rtxevent.com/).

attributes.title: Sonic’s New Look - #167
attributes.caption: If you thought the Alien chestburster was the strangest thing to come out of a man, check out what's growing inside Max.
attributes.description: If you thought the Alien chestburster was the strangest thing to come out of a man, check out what's growing in Max.  Hosted by Jon Risinger.  Featuring Burnie Burns, Ashley Jenkins, Ellie Main, and Max Kruemcke.  Sponsored by Robinhood (http://bit.ly/2O0QFqq), Postmates (Available on iOS & Android) and Mint Mobile (http://bit.ly/2OihkiG)

attributes.title: This Dog is Taking American Jobs - #168
attributes.caption: Lindsay gets arrested by a weird looking cop and Jon faces some "ruff" competition for his host job.
attributes.description: Lindsay gets arrested by a really weird looking cop and Jon faces some "ruff" competition for his host job. Featuring Lindsay Jones, Gus Sorola, Todd Womack, Andy Blanchard, and hosted by Jon Risinger. Sponsored by Candid Co. (http://bit.ly/2Dk97qG) and RTX (http://bit.ly/2CfoyRe).
attributes.display_title: This Dog is Taking American Jobs - #168

attributes.title: Secret Furries of Rooster Teeth - #169
attributes.caption: This show has gone to the dogs, literally.
attributes.description: This show has gone to the dogs, literally. Sponsored by Burrow (http://bit.ly/2HVhoV1), Upstart (http://bit.ly/2O443tJ), and Topps Marvel Collect app ( http://bit.ly/2JHg4Fw) Hosted by Jon Risinger. Featuring Barbara Dunkelman, Mariel Salcedo, Chad James and Max Kruemcke.

attributes.title: They Destroyed the Show! - #170
attributes.caption: The kids from the local sweatshop swing by to wreak havoc on the show, Blaine becomes a headless monster, Josh eats more sugar than a diabetic should, and Jessica shows us the loneliest orphan of all time.
attributes.description: The kids from the local sweatshop swing by to wreak havoc on the show, Blaine becomes a headless monster, Josh eats more sugar than a diabetic should, and Jessica shows us the loneliest orphan of all time. Sponsored by Robinhood (http://bit.ly/2O0QFqq), HIMS (http://bit.ly/2O1aQEr), and Mint Mobile  (http://bit.ly/2OihkiG) Featuring Chris Demarais, Josh Flanagan, Jessica Vasami, and Blaine Gibson. Hosted by Jon Risinger.
